Class Socket_Client

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject

it.polimi.ingsw.network.Client.Client
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Client.Socket.Socket_Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Runnable, Remote
public class Socket_Client extends Client implements Runnable
This class is the Socket extension of the abstract Client class.

      public void run()
